'''''draug''''' is a noun meaning "wolf" in [[Sindarin]].<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, ''draug''</ref>

== Example ==
* ''[[Draugluin]]'' = "Blue Wolf"

* ''[[The Languages of Tolkien's Middle-earth]]'' by [[Ruth S. Noel]]
